dm_conversation_id.title: DM Conversation ID
dm_conversation_id.description: The ID of the conversation used to DM the user (created by calling the `startDmConversation` action)

id.title: ID
id.description: The Slack ID of the user (U0000XXXXXX)

is_bot.title: Is a bot
is_bot.description: Whether the user is a bot

is_admin.title: Is an admin
is_admin.description: Whether the user is an admin

phone.title: Phone number
phone.description: The phone number of the user

email.title: Email
email.description: The email address of the user

real_name.title: Real name
real_name.description: The real name of the user

display_name.title: Display name
display_name.description: The display name of the user

real_name_normalized.title: Normalized real name
real_name_normalized.description: The normalized real name of the user

display_name_normalized.title: Normalized display name
display_name_normalized.description: The normalized display name of the user

avatar_hash.title: Avatar hash code
avatar_hash.description: A hashed representation of the user avatar's avatar

status_text.title: Status text
status_text.description: The status text of the user

status_emoji.title: Status emoji
status_emoji.description: The status emoji of the user

image_24.title: Avatar x24
image_24.description: The URL of the user avatar (24x24)

image_48.title: Avatar x48
image_48.description: The URL of the user avatar (48x48)

image_192.title: Avatar x192
image_192.description: The URL of the user avatar (192x192)

image_512.title: Avatar x512
image_512.description: The URL of the user avatar (512x512)

image_1024.title: Avatar x1024
image_1024.description: The URL of the user avatar (1024x1024)

team.title: Team
team.description: The Slack ID of the team (T0000XXXXXX)

reactionAdded.title: Reaction Added
reactionAdded.description: Triggered when a reaction is added to a message

reactionRemoved.title: Reaction Removed
reactionRemoved.description: Triggered when a reaction is removed from a message

memberJoinedWorkspace.title: Member Joined Workspace
memberJoinedWorkspace.description: Triggered when a member joins the workspace

memberJoinedChannel.title: Member Joined Channel
memberJoinedChannel.description: Triggered when a member joins a channel

memberLeftChannel.title: Member Left Channel
memberLeftChannel.description: Triggered when a member leaves a channel

addReaction.title: Add Reaction
addReaction.description: Add a reaction to a message

findTarget.title: Find Target
findTarget.description: Find a target in Slack (ex: a channel, a user to send a dm, etc)

syncMembers.title: Sync Members
syncMembers.description: Sync Slack workspace members to Botpress users. This action keeps track of the last sync timestamp and will only sync updated members since the last sync.

startDmConversation.title: Start DM Conversation
startDmConversation.description: Initiate a conversation with a user in a DM

updateChannelTopic.title: Update Channel Topic
updateChannelTopic.description: Update the topic of a channel

userId.title: User ID
userId.description: The Slack ID of the user who sent the message

channelId.title: Channel ID
channelId.description: The Slack ID of the channel where the message was sent

id.description: The Slack ID of the conversation
